QuestData.Title: Balance Without Violence
QuestData.Description: Some of the fish that the Unga hozen have gathered don't seem do be dead yet. There may still be time to throw them back into the water.
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw 6 Flailing Carp into Nayeli Lagoon.
QuestData.RewardText: The grateful fish swim happily toward the safety of the middle of the lagoon.$b$bWith any luck, they will be eaten by crocolisks.

Objectives.Objective: Throw Flailing Carp back into the water
